name: Pavle Subotic
body:
**# Pavle Subotic** 

**PhD Student @ University College London**

**Supervisor: Prof. Byron Cook**

**Contact: [first letter of firstname][lastname][at]gmail[dot]com

## Intro
Most people call me Paul. I'm at the end stages of my PhD at UCL. I have had stints at 
Oracle Labs (with Prof. Bernhard Scholz), Amazon AWS (with Prof. Byron Cook). A long time ago 
I was a software engineer at Optiver, Toshiba and CSIRO. 

## Research Interests:
Various topics relating to Program analysis and Model Checking

## Publications:
* Souffle: On Synthesising Program Analysers (To be published)
* On fast large-scale program analysis in Datalog, Bernhard Scholz, Herbert Jordan, Pavle Subotic, Till Westmann. CC'16
* Guiding Craig Interpolation with Domain-specific Abstractions, Jerome Leurox, Philipp Rümmer, Pavle Subotic. Acta Informatica, Issue 53 
* Horn Clauses for Communicating Timed Systems Hossein Hojjat, Philipp Rümmer, Pavle Subotic, Wang Yi . HCVS'14
* Exploring interpolants, Philipp Rümmer, Pavle Subotic. FMCAD'13
* Logico-Numerical Max-Strategy Iteration, Peter Schrammel, Pavle Subotic. VMCAI'13
* Static Analysis by Elimination, Bytecode@ETAPS'13
